Time series bootstrap scramble phase

Source: R/e_ts_bootstrap_phase.R
e_ts_bootstrap_phase.Rd

Time series bootstrap scramble phase

e_ts_bootstrap_phase(x = NULL)

Arguments

x

time series object

Value

x time series, bootstrapped

Examples

e_ts_bootstrap_phase(
   x = datasets::AirPassengers
 )
